old:
白竜神殿は我々白衛騎士団が
全力を持ってお守りする
竜の盾たる我々がな
column2:
The White Dragon Temple will be protected by us, the Knights of the White Guard,
with all our might.
We are the shield of the dragon.

old:
この神殿は、白竜様に仕える者が集い
守り続けてきた由緒ある尊い場所
column2:
This temple is a venerable and precious place where the servants of the White Dragon have gathered and
protected.

old:
我々白騎団、お前たち覚者隊
双方にとってそれは変わらん
column2:
We the White Riders, you the Arisen Corps
That doesn't change for either side.
There is nothing unusual in particular.

old:
何やら空から光の玉が降ってきたと
いうじゃないか
column2:
You say
that some kind of ball of light fell from the sky.

old:
つい最近のオーク共の攻撃といい
面倒なことが続くな
column2:
Just recently, the orcs attacked
and things keep getting messy.

old:
覚者隊からも見張りの担当を
立てて貰いたいものだ
column2: I'd like the Arisen Corps appoint someone in charge of the watch.

old: 聞きたい事でもあるのか？
column2: Is there something you want to ask?
